name: Getting Back to OK (Mobile Version)
description:
(We apologize, the resolution isn't as nice on mobile. But we wanted to at least make it usable.)

It's ok to NOT be ok.

We all have bad days. We all have times where it seems like the world is out to get us.

What matters isn't that we're NOT ok.

It's what we do about it.

We'd like to help.
